meanings.definition: The world of cinema or the film industry.
meanings.sent1: In the filmlands, actors work together to create movies.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of working in the filmlands one day.
meanings.sent3: The filmlands can sometimes seem like a magical place where stories come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a filmland of endless possibilities and creativity.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the filmlands of Hollywood is an exciting adventure for movie lovers.

meanings.definition: A place where movies are made or filmed.
meanings.sent1: The director scouted different filmlands for the perfect shooting location.
meanings.sent2: The old warehouse was transformed into a filmland for the new action movie.
meanings.sent3: The filmlands were bustling with crew members setting up lights and cameras.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard turned into a filmland as they filmed a short movie for fun.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the filmlands, you could feel the creativity in the air.

meanings.definition: The fictional or imaginary settings portrayed in films.
meanings.sent1: The filmlands of the sci-fi movie were filled with futuristic technology.
meanings.sent2: Audiences were captivated by the beautiful filmlands created for the fantasy film.
meanings.sent3: In the filmlands of animation, anything is possible, even talking animals.
meanings.sent4: Her mind wandered to the filmlands of her favorite movies when she needed an escape.
meanings.sent5: The filmlands of the horror movie were so realistic, it felt like you were there.
